JobFullDesc: ABOUT VTSVTS is changing the way that commercial real estate (CRE) is done—disrupting a $15 trillion industry by becoming the modern operating system for CRE. We invented the category of leasing and asset management, which allows landlords and brokers to take their entire leasing process online to maximize revenue and performance. Last year, we launched the fastest adopted new product in proptech, VTS Market. Rise Buildings by VTS is leading an entirely new category of software - tenant experience. We also recently launched VTS Data, already getting front-page references in the Wall Street Journal and quoted by Reuters, The Real Deal, Commercial Observer, and many more. Our success shows in our numbers—we hit "Unicorn" status in 2019 and today we have over 12  billion square feet of commercial space managed on VTS on 80,000 buildings in 34 countries, and we’ve expanded to over 400 employees globally. It’s an exciting time to join the VTS team as we continue to grow rapidly and break records.Our headquarters are in NYC, but we have major hubs in other cities including Chicago, IL, Toronto, CA, London, UK, San Francisco, CA, and Austin, TX. Learn more at vts.com, risebuildings.com,  or follow us on Instagram (@WeAreVTS), Twitter (@WeAreVTS), or LinkedIn. How does this Position help VTS Succeed?As an experienced technician on the IT team, you will help mature the IT processes and infrastructure, directly impacting the entire company by supporting a rapidly growing business. Reporting directly to the IT Director, you will be a senior technical resource for an IT team  supporting and assisting in all aspects of the corporate IT infrastructure, including core IT (SSO, workflow automation, network, source control, issue tracking, GSuite), Business apps (Netsuite, Salesforce, HRIS), and a variety of SaaS applications. In this very important role you will help support multiple offices with an international footprint, making an impact on the day to day productivity of the entire workforce. On the VTS IT team you will have the opportunity to use your broad IT experience to guide a rapidly growing company into a very bright future.What Makes This Job Awesome?Partner with other technical
